name: Smashalene Pixel Park
description:
THE STORY

Welcome to Planet Smashalene!

A beautiful digital world full of peace and harmony.

Or at least it was full of peace and harmony...

One day, out of nowhere, a mysterious portal appeared in the sky!

Nobody knew what was going on.

Everyone could do nothing but gaze at the portal, trembling with fear.

Then all of a sudden, an army of unknown creatures started jumping out of the portal!

What were these creatures and why were they here?

Well whatever they were, they were up to no good!

They were causing so much destruction!

Buildings were destroyed.

Fires were created.

Citizens were captured.

IT WAS HORRIFIC!

After all of the citizens were locked up, the unknown creatures took them and jumped back into the mysterious portal that sent them to their home planet:

The Dark Fortress.

But little did they know that there was one person left on Planet Smashalene.

And that's you, the player.

Can you get to the Dark Fortress and free all of the prisoners?

Find out by downloading and playing Smashalene Pixel Park when it releases soon for Windows and Mac!

While you wait, download and play the free demo!

And be sure to leave a comment to let me know what you think!

THE CONTROLS ARE EASY

Arrow keys = move tile selector

Space bar + Arrow key = grab tile

(View the tutorial in the game for more info)

THE UPDATE BOX Make sure you check out this page weekly because I will be giving you loads of updates about Smashalene Pixel Park’s development.
By the way, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR OVER 150 DOWNLOADS. THAT REALLY MEANS A LOT.
